ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 148
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unless they were a guildmate then yes, I would charge them - I spent a lot of time, effort and money getting my tinkering skill to where it is, and people
ygData.messageBody:
> The question is: if somebody walks up to you and
> says "heres all the parts, please combine those for me. if you fail,
> no worrys." would you do it? Or would you charge them for the 30sec
> it takes to hit combine. You didn't spend any cash on the item, and
> if its not a triv item, then your gaining skill (possibly) for free

Unless they were a guildmate then yes, I would charge them - I spent a lot of
time, effort and money getting my tinkering skill to where it is, and people
like this hypothetical person you mention who wan't the quick reward with none
of the effort annoy me. No, I'm not charging them for the 30sec combine, I'm
charging them for the hours I spent combining items over and over to get a skill
increase.
